message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's an investment in quality and innovation. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. We are offering this remarkable product to you for $1500000. We understand that value perception varies from person to person, so we are open to discussing terms that may better align with your expectations. Let's work together to find a solution that satisfies both of us.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this price still reflects the value of the product, but allows me to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to hear your thoughts on this counteroffer.
